text: == Events == === By place === ==== Europe ==== * Construction of the Saint Sophia Cathedral in Kiev is ended. * Ferdinand I becomes the king of Castile and Leon. * Harold I takes control of the crown of England from his half- brother Harthacanute. * George Maniaces begins a war against the Arabs in Sicily. ==== Asia ==== * The Song Dynasty Chinese rime dictionary of the Jiyun is published. * Seljuq dynasty starts. == Births == * Su Dongpo, Chinese poet (d. 1101) == Deaths == * March 16 - Robert I, Archbishop of Rouen * September 4 - King Bermudo III of Le√≥n (b. 1010) * Avicenna, Persian physician, philosopher, and scientist (b. 980) * Duke Boleslaus III of Bohemia == References ==
